TopicTitle: New forum user - Space patrol Orion

Articles.Content:
Hi, my synonym is 'BRacingGreen' and this is my first post, so please be patient to me.

I remember the sequels 'Raumpatrouille - Die phantastischen Abenteuer des Raumschiffs Orion' and 'Startreck'.

I think the 'Orion' sequel was also called 'Space Patrol'.

Both were created in 1966. So have mad a little video of the 'Orion'.

The title of the video is in german, because the following countdown is also in german and the sequel is a german TV production.

In english the title means something like:

'We wrote the year 1966, when not only the spaceship Enterprise set off for space but also the fast space cruiser Orion...'

So here is the video:

 

I hope you like it and thanks for watching.... Yours BRGreen

Hello BRacingGreen and welcome to the forums!

That show looks very interesting.  Definitely the sort of thing I would have watched if I lived in Germany.

Nice video, too.  I like your recreation of the Orion spacecraft.


Happy landings!

Hello Starhawk,

thanks for the kudos. What i forgot to mention, this Orion is build of 663 parts,

weights 59.62 tons and was build entirely in KSP 1.2 with stock parts.

I needed the TweakScale Mod for the antennas that build the guns and for the drop tank that simulate the crew elevator.

If you like it, there is an other video. I think you'll recognize that ship. Sorry no sound.

It was done with an older KSP version, with a lot of modified parts and some MODS.

I hope you like it too and thanks for watching.... Yours BRGreen
